data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Stock Looks Like a Buy with Its Earnings Release in Sight
data.text: Microsoft stock has crushed all of the FAANG stocks over the last 12 months as the historic firm proves it is one of the most solid investments in tech.

data.title: Microsoft takes on AirPods with a pricey, strange-looking rival
data.text: For months, there were rumors that Microsoft was gearing up to take on Apple's AirPods with wireless earbuds of its own. On Wednesday, Microsoft finally offered a first look at the new product — and it was strange.

data.title: Microsoft is right: Dual displays are a safer bet than folding screens
data.text: The Surface Neo and Duo are a more realistic glimpse at the future of computing.

data.title: Microsoft donates $223K to finish Seattle-Vancouver high-speed rail feasibility study by 2020
data.text: Microsoft is determined to turn the Pacific Northwest into a connected innovation mega-region akin to Silicon Valley, starting with better transportation between the biggest cities in the area.

data.title: Waiting For The Right Moment To Add To Microsoft
data.text: We're very confident of Microsoft's long-term future, and we hold the stock on a personal account basis.

data.title: Microsoft's new dual-screen computer is the company's most important product in years
data.text: Microsoft's Surface launched the era of 2-in-1 computers, the Surface Neo is the company's next bet to build the future of Windows.

data.title: Microsoft Expands Surface Device Portfolio at October Event
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) unveils innovative Surface devices at its October event, including fresh dual-screen devices with an aim to advance workspace productivity.

data.title: Microsoft: Zooming In The Cloud
data.text: Microsoft's Azure continued to grow significantly faster than Amazon's AWS in the last quarter.

data.title: Don't hold your breath for a Microsoft Windows phone. It's not happening
data.text: The company confirms it's going all in with Android on its dual-screen phone for 2020.
